Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs and expectations. Given its value and quality, I am confident it will serve you well for years to come. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $11,500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire such a high-quality item at a discounted rate. I trust you will find this offer compelling and hope we can discuss further how this product can benefit you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
